p: The assembled genome sequences obtained ranged from 11,376 to 11,811 nt, consisting of two open reading frames (ORFs) and 5′ and 3′ untranslated regions (UTRs). The phylogenetic analysis ( Fig. 1) revealed that all new sequences belong to the ECSA genotype and are in the same group as those with GenBank accession numbers MK848202 and MN630017, which were reported as cases imported from Thailand to Slovenia ( 7) and Australia.
